techmeme.title: Savvy Wealth, a digital wealth management service for financial advisors and clients, raised a $26.5M Series A led by Canvas, taking its total funding to $33M (Allie Garfinkle/Fortune)
Samsung Galaxy Watch7 review: upgraded chip and sensor, comfortable to wear, and nice circular design, but middling battery life and AI health updates are meh (Victoria Song/The Verge)
Apple, Nvidia, Alphabet, Amazon, Meta, and Microsoft stocks led a tech stock sell-off amid US recession fears; AAPL drops 5%, NVDA drops 7%+, and MSFT drops 3%+ (Aditya Soni/Reuters)
Investor letter: Elliott Management says megacap tech stocks, particularly Nvidia, were in "bubble land", and AI is "overhyped" and "not ready for prime time" (Financial Times)
An analysis of 200K+ English-language AI conversations: 21% of people use chatbots for creative writing, 18% for homework help, 17% for search, and 15% for work (Washington Post)
